thread.title: Iconic State Fair cream puff celebrates 100th anniversary in 2024
thread.title_full: Iconic State Fair cream puff celebrates 100th anniversary in 2024

title: Iconic State Fair cream puff celebrates 100th anniversary in 2024
text: Iconic State Fair cream puff celebrates 100th anniversary in 2024 Jan. 2 is National Cream Puff Day Jan. 2 is National Cream Puff Day Jan. 2 is National Cream Puff Day Video above: WISN 12 Sports Director Dario Melendez wins Wisconsin State Fair Celebrity Cream Puff Eating Contest National Cream Puff Day is kicking off a special celebration in Wisconsin: a yearlong 100th anniversary celebration of the iconic cream puff. Since 1924, the Wisconsin State Fair and the Wisconsin Bakers Association have teamed up to operate the Original Cream Puff Bakery. The Wisconsin State Fair and the entire bakery team is already gearing up for the anniversary. Fairgoers can expect fun, new flavors and exciting events ahead that celebrate 100 years of baking and serving cream puffs. Specialty cream puffs will be available for pre-order to celebrate St. Patrick's Day. The flavors will be announced at a future date, but mark your calendars for the March 15-17 drive-thru event. Wisconsin State Fair and Original Cream Puffs will also be giving away 10 vouchers for a free six-pack of Original Cream Puffs redeemable during the 2024 Wisconsin State Fair. Visit the [Original Cream Puffs Facebook page](https://www.facebook.com/originalcreampuffs/) to see more details on how to enter on Jan. 2.
